entity.name: containment_of_individual_product
entity.description:
A containment_of_individual_product is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship that is a
Containment_of_individual_product (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: an instance of product_as_individual_version that is the container.

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: an instance of product_as_individual_version that is the contained individual product.
